itemInfo.itemDesc:
A perfectly made dish of borscht. 

- Unique Effect: Max Energy +20 for 75 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Milk
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be received from a farm Quest. It can be Processed into other Cooking ingredients.\n\n- Usage: Cream, Cheese, Fruit Pudding, etc.

item.name: Fragrant Jerky
item.desc: A dried meat snack useful for long journeys.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying Butchered Meat.\n- It increases HP slightly when used.

item.name: Milk
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be received from a farm Quest. It can be Processed into other Cooking ingredients.\n\n- Usage: Cream, Cheese, Fruit Pudding, etc.

item.name: Mineral Water
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vendor or Innkeeper.\n\nâ€» Using Mineral Water on a Garden will slightly increase the amount of available Water Deposit.

item.name: Cinnamon
item.desc: Cinnamon is a specialty of Mediah.\nUsage: Borscht, Desert Dumpling, etc.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at Kasula Farm. Mediah Cinammon can also be Gathered using Bare Hands or a Hoe.
